content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment for your living needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student so I don't have much money. I was thinking about 300 euros per month. I know it's low but I hope we can find a solution.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros is far below my asking price. I'm looking for a fair market value that reflects the quality of the apartment and its prime location. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, of course. I can increase my offer to 400 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While 400 euros is more in line with what I had in mind, I'm still not sure it reflects the full value of the apartment. It's brand new, in the city center, and close to all amenities. Could you possibly go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand. I can increase my offer to 450 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for me as a student.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While 450 euros is closer to my expectations, I'd like to see if we can find a price that is mutually beneficial. How does 500 euros per month sound to you? It's a nice, round number that aligns with the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 500 euros per month sounds fair to me. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Max. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month! We have a deal. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
